reviewText:
if you have never seen King of the Cage before, this would be a a nice one to start the collection off with, tons of excitement from heavy hitters like duane "bang" ludwig, mike bourke (currently in PRIDE FC), vernon "tiger" white, todd medina, Chris brennan and more!
some people complain about the boring ground wars in UFC, none of that here people, just bombs being thrown. I myself love watching the ground game as much as standup, but you're gonna see some knockouts so good youll be feeling them tommorow..
lots of action, 5 starts for hardcore fans, you don't even have to be a hardcore fan to love this one!
